articles.title: Hong Song Nam meets Russian delegation
articles.content:
Hong Song Nam meets Russian delegation 
    Pyongyang, December 2 (KCNA) -- Hong Song Nam, Premier of the DPRK Cabinet, yesterday met and had a friendly talk with a delegation of the Academy of Sciences of Russia led by vice-president Nikolai Dobretsov who is also chairman of the Siberian branch at the Mansudae Assembly Hall.
 Present were Pak Sung Chae, vice-president of the Academy of Sciences, officials concerned and Andrei Karlov, Russian Ambassador to the DPRK.

Agreement signed between DPRK and Russia
articles.content:
Agreement signed between DPRK and Russia
    Pyongyang, December 2 (KCNA) -- An agreement on scientific cooperation between the Unjong branch of the DPRK Academy of Sciences and the Far Eastern branch of the Russian Academy of Sciences was signed here on Dec. 1.
 The agreement was inked by Kang Tong Gun, president of the Unjong branch, and Valentin Sergiyenko, president of the Far Eastern branch.

articles.title: Minutes of talks signed between DPRK and Russia
articles.content:
Minutes of talks signed between DPRK and Russia
    Pyongyang, December 2 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the DPRK Academy of Sciences and a delegation of the Russian Academy of Sciences signed minutes of talks on scientific exchange and cooperation with due ceremony here yesterday.
 Present there were Kang Tong Gun, vice-president of the DPRK Academy of Sciences, officials concerned from the DPRK side and members of the Russian delegation led by Nikolai Dobretsov, vice-president of the Russian Academy of Sciences and chairman of its Siberian branch, and Yuri Bochkaryov, counsellor of the Russian embassy here, from the Russian side.

Kim Yong Nam receives credentials from British Ambassador
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam receives credentials from British Ambassador
    Pyongyang, December 2 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, President of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, received credentials from David Arthur Slinn, new Ambassador of the United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland to the DPRK, at the Mansudae Assembly Hall on Monday.
 Present there was Choe Su Hon, Vice-Minister of Foreign Affairs.    
 After receiving the credentials, the president had a conversation with the ambassador.
